name: linter-bootlint
description: Lint Bootstrap HTML on the fly, using bootlint
readme: linter-bootlint ========================= This linter plugin for [Linter](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter) provides an interface to [bootlint](https://github.com/twbs/bootlint). It will be used with files that have the “HTML” syntax. ## Installation Linter package must be installed in order to use this plugin. If Linter is not installed, please follow the instructions [here](https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter). ### Plugin installation ``` $ apm install linter-bootlint ``` ## Contributing If you would like to contribute enhancements or fixes, please do the following: 1. Fork the plugin repository. 1. Hack on a separate topic branch created from the latest `master`. 1. Commit and push the topic branch. 1. Make a pull request. 1. welcome to the club Please note that modifications should follow these coding guidelines: - Indent is 2 spaces. - Code should pass bootlint linter. - Vertical whitespace helps readability, don’t be afraid to use it.
